description: This Java class defines a REST controller named HelloController that provides basic health, info, and documentation redirection endpoints for a chess game backend service.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: Defines public endpoints for health check, application info, and Swagger UI redirection in a Spring Boot application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome string indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health check status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
